heading: I am a software, game development, and machine learning enthusiast from Malta. My educational background consists of an M.Sc. in Machine Learning and Signal Processing and a B.Sc. in Computing Science. I was able to work in a variety of roles, including Data Science, Front End, Researcher, and Assistant Lecturer.

Throughout my educational and professional career, I have created a number of projects as part of my academic requirements or in my own time, some are available on Github. As an individual, I consider myself an outside-the-box thinker, funny, and naturally passionate about technology. I am a forward-thinker, and I could inspire people while working in a team.

types.name: Web Development
types.description: Responsive dashboards and productivity websites at high quality with the latest frameworks.

types.name: Software Development
types.description: Solving real-life problems through algorithmic solutions in a range of programming languages.

types.name: Machine Learning
types.description: Artificial applications to identify, analyse and predict patterns on data using advanced techniques.

types.name: Game Development
types.description: Computer and mobile games in FPS and top-down styles, including level designs, graphics, and scripts.
